title: cosmoblissd
author: cosmoblissd
content: CosmoBliss is building a new blockchain and seeking for premine community members which share our vision.Decentralized Deflationary Value with Built In Sovergnity. Unique Proof of Stake, Proof of Work hybrid blockchain with builtin self funded treasury.  Owners of CosmoBliss are stakeholders. Stakeholders vote onchain and decide the direction of the community, how to spend the treasury and which amazing features to build. Staking coins to earn more coins (63.000.000 total over it's lifetime). Aiming for a true DAO (Decentralized Autonomous Organization).For security purposes the blockchain daemon, controller and wallet will be separate daemons and binaries which will run in CLI. A desktop GUI wallet will also be launched in Q1-Q2 of next year.Some info:Block time: every 5 minutesTotal coins: 97.000.000Premine: 7% - 3% to devs 4% to comunityBlock reward: 144 coinsBlock reward split in:Proof of stake percentage: 70%Proof of work: 13Treasury 10% + Save The Planet Fund 7% (used for various non profit projects)Block decreases by 100/101 every 6144 blocks (21 days)SourceCode will be available before the testnet launch. We could brag all day but want to focus on deeds not words. There are plenty of differences with many existing blockchains.More details on https://cosmobliss.org (About page explains in more details)

comments.author: cosmoblissd
comments.body: We received a PM that the community signup was not working in certain mobile applications.This is a known problem regarding the captcha system and we've already addressed it on https://cosmobliss.org/join-community/  Pretty please, don't skim the text on those pages as it's meant to deter bots, please read that page as it contains usefull information The solution is to signup via a browser on a PC/desktop/laptop (or even enable desktop mode in your mobile browser). You can then login via the mobile apps.
